name: Sprint Racer
description:
Introducing the hottest 2D Racing experience Sprint Racer 2D is slot car style racing taken to another level with pick up and play controls,.

RACE ACROSS THE WORLD
The game features many different styles of circuit from street to more traditional racing tracks. Unlock them all and be a 2D racing speed king!

Sprint Racer 2D also features :

_ Championship mode - Travel the world and unlock and race exciting new tracks
_ Time trial mode - Post your fastest time on each track and show off to your friends
_ Represent your nation - 24 different countries to choose from
_ Beautiful cartoon style graphics
_ Modern console style UI
_ Exclusive tunes/sound FX
_ Online world ranking leaderboard
_ New race tracks/car content frequently added

**Game Controls**

Keyboard :
Speed - Z/N
Switch - X/M
Boost - Space
Pause - P

Controller :
Speed - R1/trigger
Switch - L1/trigger
Boost - South button
Pause - options button

If you enjoy playing Sprint Racer 2D then please feel free to drop us a review. We welcome all feedback.
